meta.label: Download Tableau Dashboard
meta.description: This recipe downloads a Tableau dashboard into a folder

outputRoles.name: output_folder
outputRoles.label: Output Folder
outputRoles.description: This is the folder where the downloaded Tableau dashboard view content will be saved

params.name: api_version
params.label: Tableau REST API Version
params.description: REST API version that matches with your Tableau Server version. Example: 3.19

params.name: site_id
params.label: Tableau Site ID
params.description: Tableau site ID in Server URL. Example: tableau_server_url/#/site/site_id/views

params.name: filter
params.label: Filter
params.description: A list of key->value pairs. Example: key1->value1, key2->value2,value3

params.name: range_filter
params.label: Range Filter
params.description: A list of key->start,stop,step. Example: Year -> 2011,2014,1

params.name: filter_column
params.label: Column
params.description: The name of the column whose unique values will be used for filtering. A dashbord is created for each unique value after other filters are applied.
